articles.title: This Rock Is Not From Earth, And We Can Finally Reveal Its Story - ScienceAlert
articles.description: With help from amateur astronomers, scientists tracked how an asteroid travelled from space, broke up in Earth's atmosphere and sent fiery fragments shooting to the ground, gathering new information about how these space rocks disintegrate.
